text: yakhana tara da'udera samane dhuke parala takhana tini tadera sanbandhe santrastha halena. Tara balale -- ''bhaya karabena na, dujana dusamana, amadera ekajana an'yajanera prati satruta kareche, ata'eba amadera madhye n'yayera sathe bicara kare dina, ara an'yaya karabena na, ara amadera sathika pathe paricalita karuna.
